local_intent: Visually confirm bread, approach and align with 0.01 tolerance under timeout, then verify position at bread.
assumptions: Robot is already above the bread from prior step
Bread grasp pose was computed earlier
coherence_with_global: Matches the approach phase after MoveAbove in GLOBAL_BT: checks visibility, executes ApproachAndAlign(target=bread, tolerance=0.01, timeout_ms=1500) with a Timeout decorator, then verifies proximity via IsAt.
